paws 0.1.9

AWS IoT Things Graph

Source: R/iotthingsgraph_service.R
iotthingsgraph.Rd

AWS IoT Things Graph provides an integrated set of tools that enable developers to connect devices and services that use different standards, such as units of measure and communication protocols. AWS IoT Things Graph makes it possible to build IoT applications with little to no code by connecting devices and services and defining how they interact at an abstract level.

For more information about how AWS IoT Things Graph works, see the User Guide.

iotthingsgraph(config = list())

Arguments

config

Optional configuration of credentials, endpoint, and/or region.

Service syntax

svc &lt;- iotthingsgraph(
  config = list(
    credentials = list(
      creds = list(
        access_key_id = "string",
        secret_access_key = "string",
        session_token = "string"
      ),
      profile = "string"
    ),
    endpoint = "string",
    region = "string"
  )
)

Operations

associate_entity_to_thingAssociates a device with a concrete thing that is in the user's registry
create_flow_templateCreates a workflow template
create_system_instanceCreates a system instance
create_system_templateCreates a system
delete_flow_templateDeletes a workflow
delete_namespaceDeletes the specified namespace
delete_system_instanceDeletes a system instance
delete_system_templateDeletes a system
deploy_system_instanceGREENGRASS AND CLOUD DEPLOYMENTS Deploys the system instance to the target specified in CreateSystemInstance
deprecate_flow_templateDeprecates the specified workflow
deprecate_system_templateDeprecates the specified system
describe_namespaceGets the latest version of the user's namespace and the public version that it is tracking
dissociate_entity_from_thingDissociates a device entity from a concrete thing
get_entitiesGets definitions of the specified entities
get_flow_templateGets the latest version of the DefinitionDocument and FlowTemplateSummary for the specified workflow
get_flow_template_revisionsGets revisions of the specified workflow
get_namespace_deletion_statusGets the status of a namespace deletion task
get_system_instanceGets a system instance
get_system_templateGets a system
get_system_template_revisionsGets revisions made to the specified system template
get_upload_statusGets the status of the specified upload
list_flow_execution_messagesReturns a list of objects that contain information about events in a flow execution
list_tags_for_resourceLists all tags on an AWS IoT Things Graph resource
search_entitiesSearches for entities of the specified type
search_flow_executionsSearches for AWS IoT Things Graph workflow execution instances
search_flow_templatesSearches for summary information about workflows
search_system_instancesSearches for system instances in the user's account
search_system_templatesSearches for summary information about systems in the user's account
search_thingsSearches for things associated with the specified entity
tag_resourceCreates a tag for the specified resource
undeploy_system_instanceRemoves a system instance from its target (Cloud or Greengrass)
untag_resourceRemoves a tag from the specified resource
update_flow_templateUpdates the specified workflow
update_system_templateUpdates the specified system
upload_entity_definitionsAsynchronously uploads one or more entity definitions to the user's namespace

Examples

if (FALSE) {
svc <- iotthingsgraph()
svc$associate_entity_to_thing(
  Foo = 123
)
}
